description: This file is a mock class definition for the ISystemAudioPlatform interface used in testing, leveraging Google Mock to create mock methods for system audio platform functionalities.

classes.name: SystemAudioPlatformAPIMock
classes.description: Mock implementation of the ISystemAudioPlatform interface for testing purposes, providing mocked methods to simulate system audio platform behaviors.

methods.name: systemAudioInitialize
methods.description: Mock method to simulate initializing the system audio platform.

methods.name: systemAudioDeinitialize
methods.description: Mock method to simulate deinitializing the system audio platform.

methods.name: systemAudioChangePrimaryVol
methods.description: Mock method to simulate changing the primary volume of the audio system.

methods.name: systemAudioSetDetectTime
methods.description: Mock method to set the detection time for system audio.

methods.name: systemAudioSetHoldTime
methods.description: Mock method to set the hold time for system audio.

methods.name: systemAudioSetThreshold
methods.description: Mock method to set the threshold value for system audio detection.

methods.name: systemAudioSetVolume
methods.description: Mock method to set the volume for a specific audio stream or element.

methods.name: systemAudioGeneratePipeline
methods.description: Mock method to generate or configure an audio processing pipeline.
